New Records: Pakistan chased down 345 to win, surpassing Ireland's previous World Cup record of 329
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored an unbeaten 131 off 121 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Rizwan said, 'Always proud when you perform like that. It was difficult and when you chase like that, it's always special.'
Dasun Shanaka said, 'The way the wicket behaved, we were 20-25 runs short. â€¦ I can't ask too much from the bowlers.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohammad Rizwan and Abdullah Shafique made history against Sri Lanka
Ben Stokes made headlines when he came out of ODI retirement but missed the match due to injury concerns
